resources.string:
Faded, A Storygame About Bullying 
A story by The Awesome Team 
Art by: Katie Tong, Michelle Lee 
Scanning: Deana Yau 
Programmed by The Awesome Team 
 
Bullying is a problem found in most schools. It is always there, and we want to help stop it. This storygame promotes bullying awareness. If you see someone being bullied, don't hesitate to report it to a teacher or other person in charge, if you don't want to step in. 
Be the change you want to see in the world.
